channel.title: US Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in US Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: WA-27 North Approaching WA-272 to US-95
item.description: WA-27 north approaching WA-272 to US-95 to Potlatch (Idaho). Normally US highway shields on big green signs in Washington are cutout and do not have the black box around the shield.

item.title: UD-95 north at ID-6 West
item.description: US-95 north at ID-6 west.

item.title: ID-8 East at US-95
item.description: ID-8 east at US-95. ID-8 joins US-95 south through Moscow.

item.title: Jct. US-95 on ID-8 East
item.description: Jct. US-95 on ID-8 East

item.title: US-12 West Approaching ID-64/ID-162
item.description: US-12 west at ID-162/ID-64. Use US-12 west for Orofino and Lewiston. Use ID-64/ID-162 west for Nezperce.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 240
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 240 - 7th St.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 207
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 207 - Mills/Levan.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 202
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 202 - Yuba Lake. The red logo on the top of the sign is for Utah State Parks.

item.title: US-64 West Approaching NM-371
item.description: US-64 West approaching NM-371 South to Crownpoint and I-40.

item.title: End ID-58 East at US-95
item.description: End ID-58 east at US-95 north to Coeur d’Alene and south to Plummer and Moscow.

item.title: End ID-60 East at US-95
item.description: End ID-60 east at US-95 north to Plummer/Coeur d’Alene, and south to Moscow.

item.title: End ID-60 East at US-95
item.description: End ID-60 east at US-95.

item.title: Jct. US-93 on ID-25 East
item.description: ID-25 east approaching US-93. A hawk is sitting on top of the Junction US-93 sign.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 81
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 81 - WA-507 North/Mellen St.

item.title: End MT-56 North at US-2
item.description: End MT-56 north at US-2.

item.title: End MT-56 North at US-2
item.description: End MT-56 north at US-2 to Troy and Libby.

item.title: End WY-130/WY-230 at Curtis St.
item.description: End WY-130/WY-230 east at BL-80/Curtis St.

item.title: End WY-151 at US-85
item.description: End WY-151 west at US-85.

item.title: End WY-216 at US-85
item.description: End WY-216 west at US-85 to Cheyenne and Torrington.

item.title: US-40 East at US-30 East
item.description: US-40 east approaching US-34 east.

item.title: US-101 North - Exit 768
item.description: US-101 north at Exit 768, Klamath Beach Road.

item.title: US-93 South Boulder City Truck Route
item.description: Hoover Dam via Boulder City Center or US-93 Truck Route on US-93 south

item.title: MT-37 South Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker to Rexford, Libby, and Libby Dam at northern beginning of MT-37

item.title: Great Falls NW Bypass
item.description: NW Bypass at the Missouri River, to Black Eagle and Havre.

item.title: I-15 at US-87 Northwest Bypass
item.description: I-15 off-ramp (Exit 282) at US-87 Northwest Bypass of Great Falls.

item.title: I-15 at US-87 Northwest Bypass
item.description: I-15 off-ramp (Exit 282) at US-87 Northwest Bypass of Great Falls.

item.title: Orange St. North (Bus. US-93) at Broadway (BL-90)
item.description: Orange St. North (Bus. US-93) at Broadway (BL-90) in downtown Missoula.

item.title: US-87 (NW-Bypass) at Vaughn Road
item.description: US-87 Bypass at Vaughn Road

item.title: End CO-318 at US-40.
item.description: US-40 to Craig and Dinosaur at end of CO-318, near Maybell.

item.title: WY-89 North at BL-80/BL-189
item.description: WY-89 North at BL-80/BL-189 to Salt Lake, and BL-80/BL-189/WY-89/Rock Springs.

item.title: WY-89 North at BL-80/US-189 East
item.description: WY-89 Overhead at BL-80/US-189 Junction

item.title: OR-126 East at US-97
item.description: OR-126 East approaching US-97 in Redmond. At the time this photo was taken, US-97 ran through downtown Redmond on two parallel one-way streets. Recently, US-97 passes through Redmond on a bypass.

item.title: OR-126 East at US-97 North
item.description: OR-126 East at US-97 North to Madras and Portland. Use OR-126 east for Prineville and John Day.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-126 West
item.description: US-97 South at OR-126 West in Redmond. Continue south on US-97 to Bend and Klamath Falls. Use OR-126 west for Sisters, Eugene, and Salem. US-97 has been rerouted through Redmond on a bypass since this photo was taken.
